import React from 'react'; import { Container, Grid, Typography, Card, CardContent, Table, TableHead, TableBody, TableRow, TableCell, Button } from '@material-ui/core'; import Popup from './popup'; const JobList = ({ jobs, users, showPopup, setShowPopup }) => ( Current Jobs {jobs.map((job) => ( Course ID Term Type Num Positions State {job.Courseid} {job.Term} {job.Type} {job.NumPositions} {job.State} {users.map((user) => (
{showPopup && ( setShowPopup(false)}>

Email: {user.Email}

Name: {user.LName}, {user.FName}

 )}
))}
))} ); export default JobList;
